headline: Is Pentair (PNR) Fairly Priced After Recent Share Pullback And DCF Check?
summary: If you are wondering whether Pentair at around US$102 a share is still a fair deal or already pricing in a lot of optimism, this article walks through what the numbers are actually saying about its value. The stock is down 2.9% over the last week and 1.5% over the last month, yet it is up 5.1% over the past year and 122.0% over three years. This may leave you wondering whether the recent softness changes the long term story. Recent attention on Pentair has focused on its position in water...

headline: Earnings Preview: What to Expect From Pentair’s Report
summary: Pentair is slated to release its fourth-quarter results this month, and consensus forecasts suggest earnings growth will remain in the low single digits.
